name: GoFrog
description:
Help Froggy make it back to the waterfall before the timer runs out, Your Bumble friend may give you a hand to catch flies to increase your time!
Catch flies to increase your play time! Catch Dragon flies and collect them to spend in the shop on new buddies, Hats and New Frogskins! 

Ages 3+

This game is also available on googleplay and applestore!
